short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create and run tests for website without writing any code.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ManualTest.io let you spend less time testing your website without jeopardizing its quality. You can create tests without writing any code, run your tests in multiple device resolutions with a click of your mouse, and synchronize your tests among your computers automatically to let you test on multiple platforms. ManualTest.io makes testing website as easy as possible for you.

• CREATE tests by using your website just like a user would, and your actions are automatically recorded to create the tests.

• RUN your tests whenever you want by replaying your actions.

• ORGANIZE your tests in end-to-end scenarios to make sure every component of your web application works flawlessly together.

• TEST in multiple device resolutions to make sure your website works across phones, tablets and desktop computers.

• TARGET your created scenarios to run against different hosts or servers, specially useful when you are developing your website on localhost or any staging environments.

• BACK UP your scenarios in the cloud automatically, so you will never lose them.

• SYNCHRONIZE your scenarios among your computers automatically, so you can create and run any of your tests on all your devices, including Windows, Mac or Linux.

• LOOK BACK on past results so you can analyze how each test performs over time.
